item.title: Heating automation - laptop
item.description: Intro My singleboard computers (Raspberry 3b, tinkerboard) in combination with the ebus adapter didn’t turn out to be very reliable. I was not able to pinpoint the exact root cause (most likely some power/voltage related issues). But on my laptop everything seems to work quite stable… . This page is mainly to document the steps starting from a fresh linux install and setting up homeassistant and ebusd. It starts with a fresh install of the debian based crunchbangplusplus, here installed on an (old) laptop with i386 processor.
